rooms.name: The Cupboard Under The Stairs
rooms.description: An extremely large room in spite of it's namesake. What's in a name anyway? Since you'll enter from a door that leads to a cupboard under a set of stairs, we thought we'd just tell like it is. In honor of Mr. Potter himself, we made sure this massive room is bursting with real estate to spread out. Just mind your head on the way in and out.

rooms.name: Lupin's Loft
rooms.description: Located in the East Wing, this airy room is named in honour of Professor Remus Lupin, O.M. (Order Of Merlin, First Class), affectionately known as Moony, who was a wizard and werewolf that played an instrumental role in the Battle of Hogwarts. A member of the The Order of the Phoenix, he is regarded as a war hero of WWII. In view of the nightly moonsrise, Lupin's Loft is perfect for those who fancy to while away the wee hours dwelling in the moonlight.

rooms.name: The Smethwyck Snuggery
rooms.description: Elliot Smethwyck invented the Cushioning Charm in 1820. Because of this, he has been credited with making broomstick travel more comfortable, and for this we thank him. We can't, however, thank him for making this room more comfortable, but this mid-sized, characterful room overlooking our gardens is sure to credit us with how to make any guest in it most, well, sung, if you will.

rooms.name: Black Lake Budoir
rooms.description: Overlooking the delightful Black Lake and the massive grounds of Hogwarts School, if it's mountainous views from the comfort of your own cosy four-poster bed you're after, look no further.

rooms.name: Weasleby's Watercloset
rooms.description: A home from home in a most magical bathroom. For the travelling ghost, ghoul, or spirit who feels most at comfortable when pottering about in the plumbing.

rooms.name: Albus's Attic
rooms.description: Named for one of the greatest Wizards ever known, Albus Dumbldore, this attic room is located on the top floor of the inn. Featuring original wooden beams with a large squashy bed, and in the name of Albus, heaps of style

rooms.name: Ignotus's Inglenook
rooms.description: The youngest of the three Peverell brothers mentioned in The Tale of the Three Brothers (The Tales of Beedle the Bard), Ignotus was described as the humblest and wisest of the siblings, surviving Death's cunning schemes using the last of the Deathly Hallows, the Cloak of Invisibility, quite cleverly. Pleasantly located  on the top floor in the eaves, one can dissapear to rest up most reasonably- all without the help of an Invisibilty Cloak.

rooms.name: The Burbage Bedchamber
rooms.description: Charity Burbage was a British witch and the Professor of Muggle Studies at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She believed that Muggles were not so different from withces and wizards, and we agree with her. In honor of this philosphy adopted by us here at Three Broomsticks, we've named a most splendid room for her and dedicate it to every Muggle who passes through our doors.

rooms.name: The Bagshot Boxroom
rooms.description: This is an extremely small room. Delighted in solitude? This one is perfect for the for the refined solo traveler and wonâ€™t have you parting with all your galleons in one place. Note: use of undetectable extension charms to accommodate a party of larger than one in this room is strictly prohibited.

rooms.name: Dippet's Dormitory
rooms.description: Armando Dippet was once Headmaster of Hogwarts school and was the predecessor to Albus Dumbledore himself. With a charming view of the village high-street below, and the Hogwarts castle turrets peaking through the trees just across the way, this comfortable room has bundles of character inside and out.

rooms.name: Lufkin's Landing
rooms.description: Minister Artemisia Lufkin, a Hufflepuff student while attending Hogwarts, eventually became the first woman ever to serve as Minister for Magic for Great Britain. A lovely loft room with her namesake fully equpped with a stocked larder, woodstove, and a spacious bed you'll never want to leave.

services.name: The Daily Prophet newspaper delivery
services.description: Have a copy of the Wizarding community's beloved daily rag waiting for you right outside your door each day of your stay. Disclaimer: your eyes are just fine, the pictures are moving.

services.name: Signature Spa Treatments
services.description: Enjoy an herbal healing spa package for the ultimate respite. Independently ran entirely by a small staff of free House Elves who love their work, proceeds earned on spa treatments are donated towards the Promotion of Elfish Welfare.

services.name: Wizarding Experience Tour of Hogwarts School
services.description: Exclusively provided through Three Broomsticks, our guests have a rare opportunity to see this legendary school through the eyes of the Wizarding World. Ticket cost will be validated on site for parents of alumni or cbildren currently accepted to Hogwarts School.

services.name: Cupid's CongÃ©
services.description: Planning a special getaway for two? Leave it to us. With the Cupid's ConfÃ© package you'll find everything you need to tack on a bit of extra whimsy to your stay. Includes a bottle of French Champagne, premium cream cake pastries and sweets locally made, breakfast for 2 during your stay, and just for good measure, a bottle of Weasley's WonderWitch love potion.
